# (PART) Programming {-}

# Data Import

Module originally written by Shiro Kuriwaki



## A is for Athens

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```


What files do we have in the `input` folder?
```{bash, echo = FALSE}
ls input
```


```{r}
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
help(package = readxl)
```


```{r}
ober_raw <- read_excel("input/complete_greek_data 5 DISTRIBUTION 2018.xlsx")
```


```{r}
ober_raw
```


```{r}
dim(ober_raw)
```

```{r}
ggplot(ober_raw, aes(x = Fame)) + geom_histogram()
```

## Fame by Regime
```{r}
ggplot(ober_raw, aes(y = Fame, x = factor(Regime), group = factor(Regime))) +
  geom_boxplot()
```



## Extra Work
```{r}
library(ggmap)
```

```{r}
greece <- get_map(location = c(lat = 39.543287, lon = 22.6382849), zoom = 5,
                  maptype = "watercolor")
ggmap(greece)
```

## Map points on it

```{r}
ggmap(greece) + geom_point(data = ober_raw, aes(y = Latitude, x = Longitude))
```
